description: This Java source file defines a REST controller 'AuthController' for handling authentication-related endpoints, including signup, login, and token refresh, in a Spring Boot web application.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: REST controller handling authentication endpoints: signup, login, and token refresh.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Creates a new user account or retrieves an existing one and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user by email and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes the JWT token for authenticated users.
